subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Possibly connected with {{cog|my|tr=khrû|t=a kind of mermaid}} and {{cog|bo|ཀླུ||serpent, [[नाग|naga]]}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). However, {{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} notices phonological differences between {{w|Old Chinese}} and {{w|Classical Tibetan|Written Tibetan}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
